actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution relating to the Bipartisan Group of Senators designated pursuant to S. Res. 19 and S. Res. 86, 99th Congress, to act as Observers of Arms Reduction or Control Negotiations.

summary.text: Amends S. Res. 86, agreed to February 28, 1985, to designate Senator Ted Stevens, of Alaska, as the Chairman of the Senate Observer Group (established to act as official observers at any formal arms reduction or control negotiations). Names additional Senators to the Observer Group and sets forth administrative provisions relating to official travel.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the Bipartisan Group of Senators designated pursuant to S. Res. 19 and S. Res. 86, 99th Congress, to act as Observers of Arms Reduction or Control Negotiations.
